text:
Creative Utilization - to be edited by Gale Adkins* This would
incorporate classroom utilization and would oover classroom
teacher ideas9 and also utilization of broadcasts by adults.
Engineering - Hon Stewart said the engineers discussed at their
meeting the idea of a whole issue once a year devoted to engineering
and new technical problems and solutions. He said they were con¬
cerned that there was no place now to which they felt they could
turn for the latest information, and that the field is progressing
so rapidly they can’t keep up. Perhaps we will be able to estab¬
lish a column for engineers. If anyone has suggestions as to who
might edit such a column, please let me know.
